section.title: Using viewers to display a tree
section.para: The TreeViewer class provides viewer support for displaying trees. The usage of this class is similar to the TableViewer class. The main difference is that the TreeViewer class requires a structured content provider. Typically your content provider has to implement the ITreeContentProvider interface to be used with your TreeViewer class.
